Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel on outskirts of town”
Reviews.Author: cpfc1984
Reviews.Content: pleasent surprise staying situated onthe main road suggest avoid morning hotels dining evening simple decent meal range beers bar restuarant bar type atmosphere breakfast usual standard france im afraid

Reviews.Title: “JUST OK. OVERPRICED FOR LOCATION AND SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: ROULA-THANOS
Reviews.Content: stayed april week hotel tour paris hotel lobby nice huge corner restaurant bar drink location centre paris quiet residential upgrade jr suite specious separated living 2 plasma tv set bed confortable design rely expect 4 hotel especially rate night pay breakfast ok variety dairy product cereals etc sufficient start day staff ok speak english metro station river bridge 10min foot
